extension_description.message: A powerful and customizable extension that harnesses the power of AI to automatically summarize the readable content of any webpage.
extension_description.description: TL;DR with GPT is a versatile browser extension that employs OpenAI's ChatGPT to generate succinct and accurate summaries of any webpage's readable content. This user-friendly tool is fully customizable, allowing you to tailor the summaries to your preferences and needs.
